Class XMLLayoutManager

java.lang.Object

public final class XMLLayoutManager
extends java.lang.Object

Represents an utility class for layout XML serialization.

Method Detail

loadLayout

public static java.lang.String loadLayout(NetDrawing drawing,
                                          java.io.File aLayoutFile)
                                   throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Reads the layout from an XML file. This method will read the layout, and then it will apply it to the provided NetDrawing instance. This method expects the NetDrawing to have a valid net handle.

Parameters:
drawing - net drawing with a valid net handle.
aLayoutFile - input layout file.
Returns:
empty string if there is no errors, or String message with all the errors.
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
See Also:
loadLayout(NetDrawing, Document)

loadLayout

public static java.lang.String loadLayout(NetDrawing drawing,
                                          org.w3c.dom.Document aLayoutDocument)
This method will read the layout, and then it will apply it to the provided NetDrawing instance. This method expects the NetDrawing to have a valid net handle.

Parameters:
drawing - net drawing with a valid net handle.
aLayoutDocument - input layout document
Returns:
empty string if there is no errors, or String message with all the errors
See Also:
loadLayout(NetDrawing, File)

loadDrawingfromLayout

public static java.lang.String loadDrawingfromLayout(NetDrawing aNetDrawing,
                                                     java.io.File aLayoutFile)
Draws a netDrawing from an XML layout file. This method will read the layout, and apply it to the given netdrawing. This method re-creates a valid net handle based on the layout.

Parameters:
aLayoutFile - input layout file.
aNetDrawing - the drawing to draw to. Should be a new, empty drawing.
Returns:
empty string if there is no errors, or String message with all the errors.

saveLayout

public static java.lang.String saveLayout(org.rakiura.draw.Drawing aDrawing,
                                          java.io.File aLayoutFile)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Saves a given NetDrawing as XML layout file. Any errors that have occurred during the process will be returned.

Parameters:
aDrawing - net drawing with the figures to be serialized.
aLayoutFile - the output XML layout file. If there is data in this file it will be overwritten.
Returns:
empty string if there is no errors, or String message with all the errors.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when something goes wrong with I/O.
